item.description:
So far I have Carnival cruise's and will get a few others.
I have information on passports,deposits, air, car rentals and so on.

We all need to pick a itinerary, cruise line and when to go.
And we should start as soon as possable to lock in the lower prices.

So I am sending a SOS for all the shipmates to attend ...

See ya

Bruce
item.how_to_find_us: 1 RIVERDALE ST / US-5 S via EXIT 13B toward W. SPRINGFIELD 2 Turn RIGHT onto BRADFORD DR. 0.1 miles 3 Turn LEFT onto CRAIG DR. 0.1 miles 4 End at Pilgrim Village Apartment Y1 (first Pilgrim Village building on left) 65 Craig Dr West Springfield
item.why: Because it will be fun and then we will all head out for a evening out. It is pot-luck so bring what ever you want - we are not fussy.
item.name: Single Mingle 'Carnival Cruise Meeting'
